data.name: Reservoir Dogs: Bloody Days - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Reservoir Dogs: Bloody Days OST buyers and gamers will recognize the energetic style of pop rock from the ‘70s in our “exclusive Dogs soundtracks”.

The original soundtrack of the game (OST) is divided into 6 tracks, with each character or “Dog” having their own charismatic theme. The songs composed for the game are a mix between their roles in the cult film and their roles in the game, with 5 additional tracks for shooting gameplay cues that will make the player feel exhilarated during the crazy rain of bullets, in a variety instrumental palette of sounds.

All and all, the OST is about 21 minutes long.

Motion Picture Artwork ® & © 2017 Lions Gate Entertainment Inc. All Rights Reserved. © 2017 Big Star Games, SL. All Rights Reserved.

data.short_description: Reservoir Dogs: Bloody Days OST offers the energetic style of pop rock from the ‘70s in a “exclusive Dogs soundtracks”. It is 21 min long and offers 11 tracks, one for each game character and 5 additional for gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS 512
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
